docna.cdata!:
Bangladesh - Tenth Imports Program : Credit
            1194 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Tenth Imports
            Program : Credit 1194 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!: Bangladesh - Tenth Imports Program Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Tenth Imports Program Credit Project
            will: (i) provide foreign exchange for the import of raw
            materials, chemicals, components, equipment and other inputs
            to enable the industrial, construction, and agricultural
            sectors to improve their capacity utilization and increase
            their output; and (ii) support the policy improvements
            introduced or planned by GOB to increase the production and
            the efficiency and equity of the distribution of foodgrains
            and, thus, to improve the overall conditions for economic
            growth in Bangladesh.

docna.cdata!: Bangladesh - Tenth Imports Program Credit Project

display_title.display_title:
Bangladesh - Tenth Imports
            Program Credit Project
